original_title: Stuck Together: Bringing Stuck on You to the Screen
overview: Comments from the Farrellys, Thomas, Wessler, Damon, Kinnear, and actors Ray “Rocket” Valliere, Wen Yan Shih, Lawyer Milloy and Tom Brady. They chat about the origins of the film and its slow path to the screen, casting, the story and character development, disabilities in the film, and their use of athletes in cameos.
title: Stuck Together: Bringing Stuck on You to the Screen
